effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Selects another friendly Pokémon at random.  If that Pokémon is holding an item, that item is removed for the duration of the battle.

This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
effect_entries.short_effect: Forces a friendly Pokémon to drop its held item.

flavor_text_entries.text:
使うと　味方の　ポケモンが
持っている　道具を　なくす。

When used, it causes an ally
Pokémon to drop a held item.

Usandolo, un Pokémon della squadra lascerà
il proprio strumento.

Misterioso amuleto redondo que aumenta la
posibilidad de encontrar Huevos en la Guardería
Pokémon.

Der Mitstreiter lässt bei Gebrauch das
von ihm getragene Item fallen.

Retire tout objet tenu par un Pokémon de
l’équipe.

사용하면 같은 편 포켓몬이
지니고 있는 도구를 잃어버린다.

つかうと　みかたの　ポケモンが
もっている　どうぐを　なくす。

When used, it causes an ally Pokémon
to drop a held item.

When used, it causes an ally Pokémon
to drop a held item.

Retire tout objet tenu par
un Pokémon de l’équipe.
